properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Low Water Advisory issued February 7 at 3:06PM EST until February 8 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, west winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts
up to 45 kt and seas 6 to 9 ft. For the Low Water Advisory,
abnormally low water levels expected falling to near 2 feet
below MLLW north of Cape Fear and less than 2 feet below south
of Cape Fear

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, until 7 PM EST this evening. For
the Low Water Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 2 AM EST
Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Below normal
water levels will result in hazardous navigating conditions.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EST SATURDAY
